sentences.sentence: While he was thinking thus elatedly, he remembered that he wanted some clean linen in the morning.
sentences.translation: 正当他美滋滋地想着这些时，他想起自己明天早晨没有干净的衬衫可换。

sentences.sentence: Competition started in the beginning of my kite will fly the highest, but also to win the game, listening to the small partners to my boast that I was thus elatedly of.
sentences.translation: 比赛开始了，一开始我的风筝就飞得最高，还赢得了比赛，听着小伙伴们对我的夸耀，我心里美滋滋的。
